knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
azm<-read.csv("unitigs_azm.csv")
cfx<-read.csv("unitigs_cfx.csv")
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
dt = sort(sample(nrow(azm), nrow(azm)*.5))
azm.train<-azm[dt,]
azm.test<-azm[-dt,]
xtrain.azm=model.matrix (azm_sr~.,azm.train[,-1])[,-1]
xtest.azm=model.matrix (azm_sr~.,azm.test[,-1])[,-1]
ytrain.azm=azm.train$azm_sr
ytest.azm=azm.test$azm_sr

dt2 = sort(sample(nrow(cfx), nrow(cfx)*.5))
cfx.train<-cfx[dt2,]
cfx.test<-cfx[-dt2,]
xtrain.cfx=model.matrix (cfx_sr~.,cfx.train[,-1])[,-1]
xtest.cfx=model.matrix (cfx_sr~.,cfx.test[,-1])[,-1]
ytrain.cfx=cfx.train$cfx_sr
ytest.cfx=cfx.test$cfx_sr

```
